name: Space Rabbits
description:
Install instructions

Download the game to your android device and install the apk.
keep in mind that this is still just a prototype and bugs may occur.

Ingame controls:
  • touch and hold the screen to charge a jump. release to jump. The green bar next to your player indicates the jump power.
  • while jumping you can touch one more time to get a double jump boost.
Second Level
  • if the orange/blue bar appears under your spaceship, you are in attack mode. The enemy ships have colored shields. tap when the green bar points to the color of the shield to shoot the ships. only the shields with the color you chose will be disabled. Some ships have multiple shield layers.
  • If the green bar next to your ship appears, you are in defend mode. tap and hold to activate our shield when the enemies attack you. The longer your shield is activated, the more your energy is drained.
